title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Alot innovation going on with Tron trx.Also world real estate moving on tron If everything collapse currency reset tron might be one of the best ones.Right now the trc20 USDT is people favorite stablecoin.But tron will go deflationary so halvingSo here the calculations of profit you might make If tron deflationary scenario going on.So 55239,79 tron Investment now Will give you 1000 000$ of dollars value of purache power.As we know Property prices reset coming you can get bundle of cheap Property with Tron becouse tron is going deflationary If your money is smaller then let's say The 1000$ Investment now Will give you 18102,89 profit.The future world Will belong to those who owns most of the tron coins.

comments.author: dwminer1
comments.body: I have read your post several times and despite my sincere intentions, I do not understand what you wanted to convey. I really would, because I like Tron project. What are you basing your calculations on? Or is this just some veiled shilling of some trx based real estate scam-platform?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Tron is now widely used due to its low fee through USDT transactions for having its own protocol. But looking at the real estate as you've mentioned it. I don't think that it is something else that someone should have been too excited about. I have seen many projects conveyed interests and focus on real estate but none of them really took place and became known with that niche of their project. It's not really going to work on that side if ever Tron or any project keeps working to the side of the real estate, it's better to leave it as good as it is.
